content: I estimated on Friday that I would spend “a lot” this weekend, and I did. Largest expense was the dog’s annual wellness exam at the vet, ringing in at $106. Second largest was a trip to Wegman’s, $80, where I was overwhelmed by how clean it was and got swayed by all the delicious cheese samples to buy what I refer to as party cheese, which I will most definitely eat alone, and not serve at a party. Other expenses included a birthday celebration ($45), paying a parking ticket ($30), and breakfast at my favorite dine, $13.71. Happy Monday, y’all. Let’s do it to it!
